review:
DR DILIP TREATED MY WIFE FEW YEARS BACK. SHE HAD MET WITH AN ACCIDENT AND GOT FRACTURED KNEE AND INTERNAL BLEEDING.
ON ADVISE OF MY FRIEND I CONSULTED HIM. 
HIS TREATMENT WAS SIMPLE, VERY MUCH ECONOMICAL AND 
FAST CURING. 
HE MADE HER WALK NORMALLY WITHIN 2 WEEKS. HIS BEST DOSE
OF MEDICINE IS GIVING CONFIDENCE TO THE PATIENTS  THAT
"THIS IS NOTHING, YOU CAN COME OUT OF IT EASILY"
THIS BOOSTS PATIENT'S MORALE AND SELF CONFIDENCE.

REALLY A GEM OF A DOCTOR IN OUR CITY....
